headline: Here's What to Expect From Keurig Dr Pepper's Next Earnings Report
summary: Keurig Dr Pepper is expected to release its fiscal third-quarter earnings soon, and analysts project a single-digit earnings rise.

headline: 2 Stocks Under $50 to Keep an Eye On and 1 We Find Risky
summary: Stocks in the $10-50 range offer a sweet spot between affordability and stability as they’re typically more established than penny stocks. But their headline prices don’t guarantee quality, and investors should exercise caution as some have shaky business models.

raw.headline: 2 Stocks Under $50 to Keep an Eye On and 1 We Find Risky

headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid KDP and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Keurig Dr Pepper has gotten torched over the last six months - since April 2025, its stock price has dropped 23.2% to $25.80 per share. This may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
